title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 2555.204 - Risers installed after January 22, 2019
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 2555.204 - Risers installed after January 22, 2019

State Regulations
(a) Riser designs must be tested to ensure
safe performance under anticipated external and internal loads acting on the
assembly. (b) Factory assembled
anodeless risers must be designed and tested in accordance with ASTM F1973 (as
described in section
10.3
of this Title). (c) All risers used to connect regulator
stations to plastic mains must be rigid and designed to provide adequate
support and resist lateral movement. Anodeless risers used in accordance with
this paragraph must have a rigid riser casing. Notes
